article: sao tome and principe civil service trades unions said they have rejected an eight percent pay rise offer from the government of prime minister maria do carmo silveira , and they could stage fresh strikes in their demand for threefold salary hikes .
abstract: public sector unions in sao tome and principe threatens strike
